entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
